title: This is coming from a woman journalist. I have no words!
selftext: This is beyond shameful. Keeping the morals about who's good and who's bad aside, no woman deserves it. Watching the video boiled my blood. And then I see an Indian journalist trying to whitewash it. What's wrong with our media?
cleaned_text: coming woman journalist words beyond shameful keeping morals whos good whos bad aside woman deserves watching video boiled blood see indian journalist trying whitewash whats wrong media
